channel.title: Old-Man-Yells-at-Cloud on Zombie Apocalypse Tech
channel.description: Recent content in Old-Man-Yells-at-Cloud on Zombie Apocalypse Tech

item.title: ZACLOG/001 - My Philosophy of Life
item.description: Zombies aren’t only monsters with rotten faces. They are any force destructive to our world. Eaters of the planet, the body, the mind, and the spirit. That’s why I strive to make things, and make them beautiful, down to the smallest detail. Especially during times like these. The things I create remind me of the world we lost, but also the world as it could be again. Just because everything has gone to hell in a handbasket, doesn’t mean we have to give in to the bastards. Don’t ever give in.
